feature.label: Control Factory Feature
feature.description: This feature contains a plugin to add a SWT widget factory to a pure E4 application. This allows high coverage of GUI code unit testing.
feature.license: This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version. See http://www.gnu.org/licenses/
